Each dashboard can contain multiple panels, each with a meaningful title that helps other users understand its purpose. After you save a dashboard, you can share it with others. Users with the appropriate permissions can edit the saved dashboard as needed.

To title a panel and save a dashboard, complete the following steps:

On the right of the **Edit panel** page, under **Panel options**, enter a panel **Title** and description.

The title appears at the top of the visualization.
When you've finished editing the panel, click **Save**.
Enter a **title** and **description** for your dashboard.
Click **Back to dashboard** to return to the dashboard view.
Click **Exit edit** to leave edit mode and view your completed dashboard.
**Did you know?** In Grafana Cloud, you can have Grafana generate panel titles and descriptions for you using generative AI features.
